god_message: Mortal, you stand before Athena, goddess of wisdom and warfare. Speak your cause with clarity and purpose.

choice_1.choice_description: Plead for Athena's wisdom to strategize against the demigods.
choice_1.god_message: Your quest for wisdom honors me. Strategy shall be your strongest ally.

choice_1.choice_description: Ask for insight on the demigods' weaknesses.
choice_1.god_message: Understanding your enemy is the first step to victory. Proceed with caution and wisdom.

choice_1.choice_description: Offer to gather intelligence on enemies.
choice_1.god_message: Your initiative is commendable. I shall consider your proposition at the day's end.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest a covert operation against a weak demigod.
choice_2.god_message: Stealth and subtlety are key in warfare. I will ponder your strategy.

choice_3.choice_description: Propose a frontal assault on the strongest demigod.
choice_3.god_message: Bravery must not lead to folly. I shall deliberate on this.

choice_2.choice_description: Seek guidance on forging alliances with other gods.
choice_2.god_message: Alliances require trust and mutual respect. Choose your allies wisely.

choice_1.choice_description: Propose a council of gods to discuss the war.
choice_1.god_message: A council could bring unity or discord. I will think over your suggestion.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest bribing lesser gods for support.
choice_2.god_message: Bribery may win support, but not loyalty. Reflect on this.

choice_3.choice_description: Recommend proving your worth to earn their allegiance.
choice_3.god_message: Deeds speak louder than words. Your idea merits consideration.

choice_3.choice_description: Inquire about enhancing your army's equipment.
choice_3.god_message: Superior weaponry can turn the tide of war. Your focus is prudent.

choice_1.god_message: Divine weapons for mortals? A bold request. I shall ponder its implications.

choice_2.choice_description: Ask for Athena's blessing on your current armaments.
choice_2.god_message: A blessing can indeed fortify your resolve and weaponry. I will consider it.

choice_3.choice_description: Suggest stealing weapons from the demigods.
choice_3.god_message: Theft is a risky venture that may lead to unnecessary conflict. I need time to think on this.

choice_2.choice_description: Offer a tribute to Athena, showcasing your dedication.
choice_2.god_message: Your tribute is noted, but true dedication is shown through actions, not gifts.

choice_1.choice_description: Present a finely crafted statue in her honor.
choice_1.god_message: Artistry and craftsmanship honor me. Your gift will be remembered as I make my decision.

choice_1.choice_description: Explain the statue symbolizes Athena's wisdom guiding your cause.
choice_1.god_message: Symbolism and thoughtfulness shine through your actions. I shall consider your words.

choice_2.choice_description: Mention the statue is from the finest artist in your land.
choice_2.god_message: While craftsmanship is to be admired, remember, true artistry comes from the soul. I will think on this.

choice_3.choice_description: Boast that the statue will make other gods envious.
choice_3.god_message: Envy has no place among the divine. Reflect on your intentions.

choice_2.choice_description: Dedicate a victory in her name at an upcoming battle.
choice_2.god_message: A victory in my name requires not only strength but wisdom. Your dedication is noted.

choice_1.choice_description: Plan a battle strategy that minimizes casualties.
choice_1.god_message: Wisdom in warfare is precious. Your approach is prudent.

choice_2.choice_description: Promise a grand spectacle of the victory.
choice_2.god_message: Spectacle without substance achieves little. I will deliberate on your offer.

choice_3.choice_description: Vow to defeat a formidable enemy leader.
choice_3.god_message: Targeting a leader can be strategic, but also perilous. I shall ponder your resolve.

choice_3.choice_description: Offer knowledge, a library in her name.
choice_3.god_message: A library is a beacon of knowledge. Such an offer speaks well of you.

choice_1.choice_description: Promise to include texts from all cultures.
choice_1.god_message: Diversity in wisdom enriches all who seek it. Your plan will be considered.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest the library also serve as a military academy.
choice_2.god_message: Knowledge and strategy should walk hand in hand. An interesting proposition.

choice_3.choice_description: Boast the library will surpass Alexandria's.
choice_3.god_message: Ambition is commendable, but humility is wisdom. I will reflect on your words.

choice_3.choice_description: Challenge Athena with a strategic game, seeking to prove your worth.
choice_3.god_message: You dare challenge me in the art of strategy? Boldness has its place.

choice_1.choice_description: Admit the challenge was to gain her favor through courage.
choice_1.god_message: Courage and honesty are virtues I admire. Your admission is wise.

choice_1.choice_description: Humbly request a lesson in strategy, regardless of the game's outcome.
choice_1.god_message: A student eager to learn is always welcome. Your humility will be remembered.

choice_2.choice_description: Offer a rematch, promising a more thoughtful approach.
choice_2.god_message: Persistence paired with reflection can lead to growth. I will consider your request.

choice_3.choice_description: Claim you let her win to show respect.
choice_3.god_message: Respect is shown through actions, not deceit. Contemplate your approach.

choice_2.choice_description: Strategically let Athena win, showing humility.
choice_2.god_message: Humility before the gods is wise. Yet, the true test is in genuine effort.

choice_1.choice_description: Express gratitude for the opportunity to learn from her.
choice_1.god_message: Gratitude and a willingness to learn are commendable. Your words will be weighed.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest the game was rigged in her favor.
choice_2.god_message: Accusations without proof lead only to discord. Reflect on your words.

choice_3.choice_description: Ask for a critique of your strategy to improve.
choice_3.god_message: Seeking improvement is the path to wisdom. Your request will be considered.

choice_3.choice_description: Play to win at all costs, showing determination.
choice_3.god_message: Determination is valuable when paired with honor. Your actions speak volumes.

choice_1.choice_description: Apologize for any disrespect, emphasizing your commitment to victory.
choice_1.god_message: An apology paired with understanding is a step towards wisdom. I will ponder your commitment.

choice_2.choice_description: Defend your aggressive strategy as a demonstration of will.
choice_2.god_message: A strong will must be balanced with wisdom. Your justification will be considered.

choice_3.choice_description: Promise to use such determination only against enemies.
choice_3.god_message: Using your strength wisely is a virtue. Your promise holds weight.

bonus_question.god_message: Which of these halls does not have a canteen?

choice_1.god_message: Not quite. I need time to think on your request. Return to your world, mortal.

choice_2.god_message: Not quite. I need time to think on your request. Return to your world, mortal.

choice_3.god_message: Very good. I shall consider your request. Return to your world, mortal.
